name: Snakes and Ladders (Text-Based Edition)
description:
It's the Snakes and Ladders you all remember from your childhoods, but now in a text-based format.  It can be played solo or with two players sharing the screen.

Single Player: Race to the top against an AI player. There's a story and, depending on where you land, your character develops different characteristics.

Two Players: Decide who's Player 1 and who's Player 2 and off you go. Less story elements here, just rolling the digital die.

This is a first draft of the game. I plan to enhance the single player story/text, possibly add new features. Maybe even some kind of save game and achievement system. Comments and feedback definitely encouraged.

(Update to make the mobile view of the game more friendly is coming imminently!)
